why_questions.query: Why choose Next.js over other frameworks?
why_questions.answer: Next.js is superior for business websites because it provides built-in SEO optimization, server-side rendering, automatic code splitting, and excellent performance. Unlike other frameworks, Next.js offers these enterprise features out-of-the-box, making it ideal for businesses serious about online success.

why_questions.query: Why should I hire a local Perth developer?
why_questions.answer: Hiring a local Perth developer offers advantages like face-to-face meetings, same timezone collaboration, understanding of Australian business requirements, local market knowledge, and easier project communication. comparison_questions.answer: Next.js is significantly better for SEO than React alone. While React requires additional configuration for server-side rendering, Next.js provides it built-in. Next.js also offers automatic code splitting, image optimization, and meta tag management, making it the clear choice for SEO-focused applications.

Custom development with Next.js offers superior performance, security, and scalability compared to WordPress. While WordPress is suitable for simple blogs, custom applications provide unlimited functionality, better SEO, faster loading times, and long-term cost efficiency for serious businesses.
